title: Autofills Suddenly Stopped Working for Addresses and Credit
content:
Firefox 88.0.1 on MacOS Big Sur 11.2.3

Two evenings ago I noticed my address wasn't filling in when I was checking out on a shop and thought it was simply the site. Yesterday morning, same issue, different site. Credit cards weren't filling in. I tried another site and another and another... All the same issue!

I tried disabling extensions, clearing my cache, quitting and restarting Firefox, and several suggestions on this forum for about:config. Nothing has worked.

I don't know if the attached screenshot will help. Hopefully it does.

I hadn't touched a single setting prior to this happening so I have no idea why it simply decided to stop?

Thank you!
creator: sccjyx

title: Lost 1200 tabs! Please please help!
content: My tabs failed to open after a Firefox crash. There is nothing else than a 2 kb file in sessionstore backups. Is there anything else I can do, or is all lost? 1200 is a lot, and those tabs hold great value to me. So I'm kind of desperate right now. Any help would be immensely valued! (I will start using a session backup plugin for sure.)
creator: hvitveispike

title: Webcam não funciona corretamente no Firefox versão atual 88.0.1
content: Boa noite! O Firefox atualizou automaticamente. Depois disso, não consegui mais visualizar minha própria imagem nas reuniões online (google meet ou jitsi meet). Desinstalei o Firefox, apaguei a pasta Mozila (em c:\usuários\nome do usuário\appdata\Roaming\Mozila), instalei o Firefox com a versão antiga 86.0.1 e bloqueei a atualização automática. Resolvi o problema da webcam, porém vou ficar sem atualização do Firefox. Utilizo o Windows 10. Existe alguma configuração na versão atual do Firefox para resolver esse problema?
creator: 001.danielsantana

title: Can I view when an autofill address was made?
content:
I recently was looking through my autofill addresses when I noticed a name that should not be there. Someone I do not know in some state that I do not live in. I quickly changed my firefox password and various passwords that may have been compromised.

My question is, how worried should I be? How did they get my password or access to a PC with my account active on it. Then why would they be so daft to save their name and address as the autofill?

Is there any way I can check when it was made or pass this on to Mozilla support?
creator: jmconwell54

Leish

creator: sdodell

title: restrict extension access permissions by url
content:
if an extension requires an 'Access your data for all websites' permission then firefox requires me to choose either allow this extension to steal all my sensitive data, or not to use the extension at all.

for such cases, chrome allows me to choose when and where i prefer to allow the extension to see these data and when and where to restrict it from accessing them: Site access Allow this extension to read and change all your data on websites you visit:

  • On click
  • On specific sites
  • On all sites

does firefox allow this somehow? i'd prefer to have an option to restrict such access in some cases by clicking the extension button, in some - by white or black listing specific sites (mostly whitelisting), and for some cases - do not restrict.
creator: musilla
